description: Describes the current user's special folders; the RootFolder and the RecycleBin. RootFolder is the root of user's files and folders and RecycleBin is the root of recycled items. This is not a valid action for SigV4 (administrative API) clients. This action requires an authentication token. To get an authentication token, register an application with Amazon WorkDocs. For more information, see Authentication and Access Control for User Applications in the Amazon WorkDocs Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: ParentFolderId
nested_items.description: The ID of the parent folder.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the folder was created.

nested_items.name: ModifiedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the folder was updated.

nested_items.name: ResourceState
nested_items.description: The resource state of the folder.

nested_items.name: Signature
nested_items.description: The unique identifier created from the subfolders and documents of the folder.

nested_items.name: Labels
nested_items.description: List of labels on the folder.

nested_items.name: Size
nested_items.description: The size of the folder metadata.

nested_items.name: LatestVersionSize
nested_items.description: The size of the latest version of the folder metadata.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: The marker for the next set of results.
